    • Method Detail

      • existsByTmAndUser_IdAndType

        boolean existsByTmAndUser_IdAndType​(java.lang.String tm,
                                    java.lang.String userId,
                                    UserAuthenticationType type)
        Checks if an user authentication by trademark and user and type exists.
        Parameters:
        tm - the trademark.
        userId - the user ID.
        type - the type.
        Returns:
        true if the user authentication exists, false otherwise.

      • existsByTmAndUser_IdAndTypeAndMfaEnabledIsTrue

        boolean existsByTmAndUser_IdAndTypeAndMfaEnabledIsTrue​(java.lang.String tm,
                                                       java.lang.String userId,
                                                       UserAuthenticationType type)
        Checks if an user authentication by trademark and user and type exists with MFA enabled.
        Parameters:
        tm - the trademark.
        userId - the user ID.
        type - the type.
        Returns:
        true if the user authentication exists, false otherwise.

      • findByTmAndUser_IdAndType

        UserAuthenticationByPasswordEntity findByTmAndUser_IdAndType​(java.lang.String tm,
                                                             java.lang.String userId,
                                                             UserAuthenticationType type)
        Finds an user authentication by trademark and id.
        Parameters:
        tm - the trademark.
        userId - the user ID.
        type - the type.
        Returns:
        the user, or null if not exists.
